definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to serve as an official/an official/the two chess pieces in Chinese chess guarding the "general" or "king" 將|将[jiang4]

sentences.english: These look to be Hermes only.
This building is adorned with mythological characters, Athena and Hermes.
sentences.chinese: 这座建筑装饰着神话人物，阿西娜和爱马仕。

sentences.english: Pedestrians walk past a soon-to-open Hermes store in Beijing in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 2009年，行人走过即将开张的爱马仕北京店。

sentences.english: It is a strategic move that could well pay off for Hermes.
sentences.chinese: 这是一项战略性举措，可以很好报复爱马仕。

sentences.english: The French luxury good company Hermes recently opened a boutique in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 法国奢侈品大亨爱马仕最近在上海开了一家店。

sentences.english: And she's also showed off an impressive collection of Chanel and Hermes bags.
sentences.chinese: 她还炫耀了香奈儿和爱马仕的名包收藏。

definition: bag or purse etc/small bump or pimple/hillock
Van Cleef & Arpels (French luxury jewelry company)
